name: thunder-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An electrified punch that may paralyze the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: An electrified punch that may paralyze the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
